question: Which Indian think-tank has co-hosted the Dhaka Global Dialogue-2019 recently?
explanation: The first edition of the three day long Dhaka Global Dialogue is being organized in Dhaka, Bangladesh. The three day long programme is being jointly organized by the Observer Research Foundation (ORF) and the Bangladesh Institute of International and Strategic Studies (BIISS). Over 150 delegates from 50 countries are participating in the conference to discuss some of the most pressing global imperatives in the context of the Indo-pacific region.
